title: Bridge (Hallowed Sepulchre)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Broken Bridges can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player can fix it using a hammer, a saw, 2 planks and 5 nails to reach the other side and loot the coffin. Fixing the bridge requires 56  Construction (boostable from 53 with crystal saw). Crossing the bridge will reward the player from 50 to 80  Agility experience when crossing both ways, the experience increasing the lower you descend into the sepulchre. The bridge can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out, the bridge can no longer be built, but can continue to be crossed for experience.

Broken Bridges can be found inside of the Hallowed Sepulchre. The player can fix it using a hammer, a saw, 2 planks and 5 nails to reach the other side and loot the coffin. Fixing the bridge requires 56 Construction (boostable from 53 with crystal saw). Crossing the bridge will reward the player from 50 to 80 Agility experience when crossing both ways, the experience increasing the lower you descend into the sepulchre. The bridge can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out, the bridge can no longer be built, but can continue to be crossed for experience.

When attempting to build a bridge, it is possible to fail and break the nails. If equipped or in the inventory, the Hallowed hammer will never break nails, regardless of the plank and nail combination used.

Planks Nails Experience Cost Cost per experience
Plank Steel nails 150 Construction 648 4.32
Oak plank Mithril nails 300 Construction 1,158 3.86
Teak plank Adamantite nails 450 Construction 2,327 5.17
Mahogany plank Rune nails 700 Construction 8,301 11.86

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
2 July 2020
(update)

The Agility XP gained from treasure encounters on Floor 5 of the Hallowed Sepulchre has been reduced from 100XP to 80XP.

24 June 2020
(update)

The XP rates for completing a treasure encounter have been adjusted. Floor 4 changed from 50 to 75, and floor 5 changed from 50 to 100.

'''Broken Bridges''' can be found inside of the [[Hallowed Sepulchre]]. The player can fix it using a hammer, a saw, 2 planks and 5 nails to reach the other side and loot the [[Coffin (Hallowed Sepulchre)|coffin]]. Fixing the bridge requires 56 {{SCP|Construction|link=yes}} (boostable from 53 with [[crystal saw]]). Crossing the bridge will reward the player from 50 to 80 {{SCP|Agility|link=yes}} experience when crossing both ways, the experience increasing the lower you descend into the sepulchre. The bridge can be crossed again, but experience is only awarded for the first crossing and return. After the timer runs out, the bridge can no longer be built, but can continue to be crossed for experience.

When attempting to build a bridge, it is possible to fail and break the nails. If equipped or in the inventory, the [[Hallowed hammer]] will never break nails, regardless of the plank and nail combination used.
